privacy_title: Privacy Policy — Entrfy AI Email Classifier

privacy_sections.title: 1. Introduction
paragraphs: Entrfy AI Email Classifier (“Entrfy”, “we”, “our”, or “the Service”) is an AI-powered email automation tool that categorizes Gmail messages using artificial intelligence.
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use Entrfy and connect your Gmail account.
By accessing Entrfy or connecting your Gmail account, you consent to the data practices described in this Privacy Policy.

privacy_sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
paragraphs: Entrfy collects only the minimum data required to provide our classification service.
We collect the following:
• Account information: email address, login metadata, and subscription details.
• Gmail OAuth tokens (access_token, refresh_token, expiry_date).
• Gmail metadata such as subject line, sender email/domain, snippet, date, message ID, thread ID, and extracted URL domains.
Entrfy does NOT collect or store full email bodies or attachments under any circumstances.

privacy_sections.title: 3. How Gmail Data Is Used
paragraphs: Entrfy processes new incoming Gmail INBOX messages to detect email events and categorize them using AI.
Collected metadata is used exclusively to:
• Identify new messages through Gmail History API.
• Run AI-based classification.
• Apply or update labels in your Gmail account.
Entrfy does NOT:
• Sell Gmail data.
• Use emails for advertising.
• Train third-party AI models with your email content.
• Access or analyze emails outside your INBOX.
Entrfy fully complies with Google API Limited Use Restrictions.

privacy_sections.title: 4. AI Processing
paragraphs: Entrfy uses Fireworks.ai to classify email metadata. Only minimal information is transmitted for classification purposes:
• Subject line
• Short snippet (partial body sample, maximum a few lines)
• Sender domain
• Extracted link domains
• User label configuration
Entrfy NEVER sends:
• Full email bodies
• Attachments
• Images
• OAuth tokens
• Personal files or complete thread histories

privacy_sections.title: 5. Data Storage and Retention
paragraphs: Entrfy stores only the minimum amount of data necessary to provide its service:
• Encrypted OAuth tokens
• Email metadata (subject, snippet hash, sender domain, and classification result)
• Classification templates for accuracy improvement
Entrfy does NOT store full email bodies, attachments, or HTML content.
Retention:
• OAuth tokens are deleted immediately once the user disconnects their Gmail account.
• Logs and temporary data are retained for 30–90 days before automatic deletion.
• User account data is retained until the account is deleted by the user.

privacy_sections.title: 6. Disconnecting Gmail
paragraphs: When a user disconnects Gmail from Entrfy:
• All OAuth tokens are permanently deleted.
• Gmail watch processes stop instantly.
• Entrfy ceases all data access from the Gmail account.
• No new emails are processed.
• Gmail-related metadata becomes inactive.
This action is irreversible for security reasons.

privacy_sections.title: 7. Data Security
paragraphs: Entrfy implements industry-standard security practices to protect your information:
• Encrypted MongoDB storage
• HTTPS enforced across all API endpoints
• AWS EC2 secure environment
• Encrypted OAuth token storage
• Access control and rate limiting
• No sensitive data written to logs
Entrfy continuously reviews its security posture.

privacy_sections.title: 8. Data Sharing
paragraphs: Entrfy only shares limited metadata with Fireworks.ai strictly for classification purposes.
No email body content or sensitive data is shared.
Entrfy does NOT sell, rent, or trade user information.
Entrfy does NOT share Gmail data with advertisers or unrelated third parties.

privacy_sections.title: 9. User Rights (GDPR/KVKK)
paragraphs: Users have the right to:
• Access stored personal data
• Request deletion of all stored metadata
• Disconnect Gmail at any time
• Request export of stored metadata
To exercise your rights, contact: support@entrfy.com

privacy_sections.title: 10. Children’s Privacy
paragraphs: Entrfy is not intended for children under the age of 16.
We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors.

privacy_sections.title: 11. Policy Updates
paragraphs: Entrfy may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
Users will be notified of material policy changes via email or in-app notifications.

google_limited_sections.title: 1. Overview
paragraphs: Entrfy AI Email Classifier uses Gmail API data strictly in accordance with Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.
This page explains how Entrfy accesses, uses, stores, and protects Gmail data.

google_limited_sections.title: 2. Gmail Data We Access
paragraphs: Entrfy only requests the minimum Gmail permissions required to operate:
• Read new messages in your Gmail INBOX (metadata only)
• Apply or update labels using Gmail label scopes
Entrfy does NOT request permission to:
• Read or modify emails in other folders
• Access or download attachments
• Read full message bodies

google_limited_sections.title: 3. How Gmail Data Is Used
paragraphs: Entrfy uses Gmail metadata solely for the following purposes:
• Detecting new emails using Gmail History API
• Classifying emails using AI
• Applying the correct label back to your Gmail account
Entrfy does NOT:
• Sell Gmail data
• Share Gmail data with advertisers
• Use Gmail data to build advertising profiles
• Train external AI models using Gmail content

google_limited_sections.title: 4. AI Processing Limitations
paragraphs: The following information may be sent to an AI classification model:
• Subject line
• Short snippet (a few lines of the email body provided by Gmail)
• Sender domain
• URL domains extracted from the email
Entrfy NEVER sends:
• Full email bodies
• Attachments
• Images
• OAuth tokens
All AI processing complies with Limited Use restrictions.

google_limited_sections.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
paragraphs: Entrfy stores only the minimum metadata needed to classify emails.
We do NOT store:
• Full message bodies
• Attachments
• HTML content
Gmail OAuth tokens are encrypted and automatically deleted when a user disconnects Gmail from Entrfy.

google_limited_sections.title: 6. No Human Access
paragraphs: Entrfy does not allow human access to Gmail data except:
• If required by law
• If explicitly granted by the user in writing for support purposes
Otherwise, Gmail data remains fully automated and inaccessible to staff.

google_limited_sections.title: 7. Compliance Statement
paragraphs: Entrfy fully complies with Google API Services User Data Policy.
We do not use or transfer Gmail data except to provide or improve user-facing features.
We do not transfer Gmail data to third parties except to provide the core classification service.
